title: bitcoinore.com
author: bitcoinore.com
created_time: September 07, 2023, 10:18:19 PMLast edit: September 08, 2023, 08:16:29 PM by bitcoinore.com
content: Hi everyone,I need help running a signature campaign for my new site http://deteriora.com If you have experience, please apply by replying with the following info for each campaign you've run and managed:Code:Name of Campaign: Link to thread:Bid for running the campaign in BTC:Discover.Connect.Discuss | Yes to  Deteriora. | No to Reddit! | Claim Full Voting Power!  Join Now!Code:[center][table][tr][td][right][font=arial black][size=11px][color=#1a1a1a]Discover[/color][color=transparent].[/color][color=#5865f2]Connect[/color][color=transparent].[/color][color=#1a1a1a]Discuss[/color][/size][/font][/right][/td][td][font=arial black][size=22pt][color=#5865f2] | [/color][/size][/font][/td][td][font=arial black][size=20pt][url=https://deteriora.com/][color=#00CC00]Yes to [/color] [color=#5865f2]Deteriora[/color][color=transparent].[/color][/url][/size][/font][/td][td][font=arial black][size=22pt][color=#5865f2] | [/color][/size][/font][/td][td][font=arial black][size=20pt][url=https://deteriora.com/][color=#DD0000]No to [/color][color=#660000]Reddit![/color][/url][/size][/font][/td][td][font=arial black][size=22pt][color=#5865f2] | [/color][/size][/font][/td][td][font=arial black][size=11px][url=https://deteriora.com/][color=#0d6efd]Claim Full Voting Power[/color][color=#AA6efd]![/color] [color=#00AA44] Join Now![/color][/url][/size][/font][/td][/tr][/table][/center]

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: If you want a manager with extensive experience I vouched for Royse777  You deserve nothing less, you have a very interesting project, it is about time a platform challenge Reddit, They are very strict and censor a lot of topics and subject, good luck to your project.

comments.author: sunsilk
comments.body: I recommend you checking the Overview of Bitcointalk Signature Anti-Spam Campaign Managers.I personally recommend Hhampuz as he's the one managing the campaign that I am currently in. Also, yahoo is another campaign manager that has managed a lot of campaigns and known doing this stuff.Both of them are good and can do the job well done, check their threads on that link together with the other managers as well for the rates and negotiations.

comments.author: Lakai01
comments.body: Quote from: sunsilk on September 08, 2023, 03:34:30 AMI personally recommend Hhampuz as he's the one managing the campaign that I am currently in. Also, yahoo is another campaign manager that has managed a lot of campaigns and known doing this stuff.I see it the same way. I have worked with both Yahoo and Hhampuz for several years now and can highly recommend both from a campaign participant's perspective. Who I have not worked with personally is icopress, he also enjoys an excellent reputation in our German-speaking community as a bounty manager and also shows again and again with new ideas that he wants to get the best possible out for both sides - the company behind the campaign and also the campaign participants. @OP, so I would just contact them and get in touch with the one that suits you best.

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: Message sent to OP, I don't think many will want to comply with your requests as far as bid and all that go. I will say that hiring the cheapest offer is not always the smartest thing. You get what you pay for.

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Thus discussions that take place in the private because of the need to mention a lot of details, but the management of a signature campaign is costly as you may need 500 dollars per week to 5000 dollars per week and you need to be continuing for 3 months to 6 months before you are governed as successful or a failure so you may need 1-2 Bitcoin to manage a campaign for a while enough to judge.you find that signature campaigns are often from well -funded medium and large projects .

comments.author: DoublerHunter
comments.body: ^ Signature campaign will not have an effect on the marketing in 2-3 weeks, it matters in months.The OP promoting a forum website which I think is an undeveloped website since as you can see there is a text error there. The URL is also not safe to browse, fix it first before promoting it. The campaign manager is not a problem here given the selection above and also find a signature designer that looks professional design.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: Quote from: bitcoinore.com on September 07, 2023, 10:18:19 PMHi everyone,I need help running a signature campaign for my new site http://deteriora.com If you have experience, please apply by replying with the following info for each campaign you've run and managed:OP there are lots of campaign mangers here with lots of work experience to deliver your work to your taste based on your bargain. Royse777 is amongst the top campaign managers who you can entrust your work to. He is well experienced and vast in the campaign management with lots ofÂ recorded project success. You can reach out to him for further discussions. Checkout his work portfolio

comments.author: Eternad
comments.created_time: September 08, 2023, 11:27:32 AMLast edit: September 08, 2023, 12:27:39 PM by Eternad
comments.body: Quote from: bitcoinore.com on September 07, 2023, 10:18:19 PMHi everyone,I need help running a signature campaign for my new site http://deteriora.com If you have experience, please apply by replying with the following info for each campaign you've run and managed:No offense but the forum you are planning to promote looks like a downgrade version of one community on reddit. The format is same with Reddit and nothing to see that much on the forum.I suggest to improve the forum first before you start advertising it because thereâ€™s nothing to do there with limited content available. @Julerz12 is your guy if you want a budget friendly campaign since he manage few campaigns before with not that huge budget.

comments.author: elevates
comments.body: My opinion OP would be to promote your project using socail media campaign. You project looks like a reddit news scrapper, It would be best in your interest to start a reddit social media campaign than a signature campaign. Above all it is your choice, as I feel you won't be able to generate the required traffic through a signature campaign.If you want I can help you in promoting your project at a cheap price. I am sending you a proposition letter with how all the details through a DM. Please do check and reply.

comments.author: FatFork
comments.body: There are several good informational threads about campaign managers offering their services on the forum:[ list] Campaign Management ServicesOverview of Bitcointalk Signature Anti-Spam Campaign Managers And if you need other services like graphic design or escrow services, you can check out this topic from tranthidung:[Overview] Bitcointalk Services from Bitcointalk MembersBut, OP, my first suggestion is to create a well-crafted announcement (ANN) about your service (assuming it is at least somewhat related to Bitcoin) in the Service Announcements section.

comments.author: Saisher
comments.body: Quote from: FatFork on September 08, 2023, 12:04:14 PMBut, OP, my first suggestion is to create a well-crafted announcement (ANN) about your service (assuming it is at least somewhat related to Bitcoin) in the Service Announcements section.I think he is well aware of that and maybe he needs someone to get a piece of advice on how to properly set up everything here in Bitcointalk He has a hero account he knows how everything works here or has this on his mind but wants to hire a campaign manager first so he can launch his campaign here simultaneously, forum thread, signature campaign, and bounty campaign.

comments.author: noormcs5
comments.body: Quote from: yahoo62278 on September 08, 2023, 06:25:26 AMMessage sent to OP, I don't think many will want to comply with your requests as far as bid and all that go. I will say that hiring the cheapest offer is not always the smartest thing. You get what you pay for.When you see the OP post he is looking for "Bid for running the campaign in BTC:", which clearly states that he is looking for the cheapest manager.I hope OP (being a hero member on this forum) knows that if he hires a trusted manager, his project will get better exposure as compared to hiring a non-professional newbie person who may charge less but may not be good for the overall campaign.

comments.author: arabspaceship123
comments.body: It's the first time I've seen managers being asked to bid for sig campaigns.
